column4: hi , does ubuntu really did a clean uninstall for application ?
such as if I install a program , will it still leave a trace such as a few file ?

When you purge a package all of the files it installed are removed.  If it created any user configuration files (they would be in your homedir or stored data for that matter) when you ran the program, those won't be removed automatically.
This channel is english only, thanks
